title: Mads Pedersen Outmuscles Wout van Aert in Brutal Giro d’Italia Finale, Isaac del Toro Reinforces Authority in Pink
content:
Pink jersey Del Toro expands gap over teammate Ayuso on stage 13 with intermediate bonuses and a split at the finish line. Who can stop the Mercxian Mexican?

Read the full article at Mads Pedersen Outmuscles Wout van Aert in Brutal Giro d’Italia Finale, Isaac del Toro Reinforces Authority in Pink on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
